EmailTemplate.name: UW OwnerAssignment
EmailTemplate.subject: An Underwriting record has been assigned to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {!Underwriting__c.OwnerFirstName}, Please be advised that an underwriting record has been assigned to you on the Implementation Case: {!Underwriting__c.Implementation_Case_Number__c}. Details: Account Name : {!Underwriting__c.Account_Legal_Name__c}. Underwriting Number: {!Underwriting__c.Name}. To view the Underwriting record, please see the below link: {!Underwriting__c.Link}. Thank you!
